Can I please get feedback from as many people as possible in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4427 ?

Rethink the icon for "Structure" in the admin bar · Issue #4427 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
This came up in #3906, where we are planning to modernize the dated sorting icons in sortable tables, and these ones are considered as an option: (the icon we currently use for the Structure menu i...

...I've filed 3 separate PRs and posted screenshots in different comments, so if you can add :+1: or :thumbs_down: reactions to them (or comment or provide a PR to suggest a different icon), that would be great.

...since the current icon for the Structure menu is used for sorting, it is a candidate for https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3906 ...so that issue is basically blocked on 4427

[UX] Update the dated icons for sorting tables · Issue #3906 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Those caret icons are dated, and they are being used all over the place: It does make sense when used to expand/collapse things: ...but we should be using more universally acceptable icons for sort...

klonos said:

Can I please get feedback from as many people as possible in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4427 ?

Since you said "as many people as possible" I went to the issue to see if I could say anything useful. Other than "I like the arrows next to the bars" I'm not sure what I can add, other than that it looks like people seem to be considering all the relevant issues I know of.

Thanks for having a look @Luke McCormick :pray: ...that's what I'm after really: people having a look at the different proposed icons, their either see the screenshots or live-test the respective PR sandboxes, and finally up/down-vote the comment with the icon(s) they like/dislike ...perhaps provide feedback as to why a certain icon is better for the Structure menu item, or why another is not.
